ygData.subject: hmm, things seem to have changed,,,
ygData.msgSnippet: I left EQ a While back, I am debating wether or no to return. (since I am stuck in B.F.E. I might since I have no one eles to play 3e d&d wit.) anywho,
ygData.messageBody:
I left EQ a While back, I am debating wether or
no<br>to return. (since I am stuck in B.F.E. I might since
I have no one eles to play 3e d&d wit.)<br>anywho,
it seems that the evergestapo have done <br>the
impossible.<br>1) no one and I mean NO ONE dares to sell any<br> eq
plat, items or characters.<br>2) searching the web for
cheat sites, results in<br>a day wasted pulling up dead
links (*and I mean DEAD!*).<br><br>the evergestapo have
it in for the cheaters out there, damn shame
is...<br>I am a cheater. I did buy extra platinum when <br>I
was playing and used it to aid newbies and <br>master
my craft skills. <br>yes, I am a perpitrator of the
greatest evil that the game has ever known.<br>I like to
give new rangers,bards,druids, 35 plat total in store
bought leather, a shield and a decent NON RUSTY
scimitar.<br>I am guilty,<br>I ask to be punished for my
crimes.<br>signed,<br>psyker
